sgtourism

The sgtourism R package contains the code used to produce the official St.Gallen Tourismus Dashboard.

Installation

You can install the package like so:

install.packages("sgtourism", repos = "https://swissstatsr.r-universe.dev")

Run the app

You can launch the dashboard locally like so:

library(sgtourism)

run_app()

How to update data

The app is built using the golem R package.

To update the data, you should first replace the CSV file in the “data-raw” folder.

Then you should run the related R script in the “data-raw” folder, which will create a local RDA file in the “data” folder.

Once it is done, you can open the “app.R” file and push the updated app.

Dockerfile with renv 

# If you want to deploy via a generic Dockerfile
golem::add_dockerfile_with_renv(output_dir = "deploy")
